title: $12 million campaign continues at Ivy Tech - MyWabashValley.com
content: $12 million campaign continues at Ivy Tech  MyWabashValley.com
description: TERRE HAUTE, Ind. (WTWO/WAWV) — $12 million; that’s how much money Ivy Tech’s Terre Haute campus is hoping to raise through its current fundraising campaign. “It really is compreh…
